Welcome!

This the home page of the San Diego Pinball Club! We are a fun bunch who get together to find and play pinball. Some of us compete competitively. Some flip for fun. A lot of us do both!

Did You Know?

Pinjury
An injury sustained specifically because of pinball.
This can include maladies suffered due to playing pinball or through the effort of supporting the hobby or the sport of pinball.

Examples of Pinjuries include but are certainly not limited to the following:

  • Spraining a wrist due to too many slap saves, or bang backs, or death saves for that matter
  • Accidents that can occur due to moving many machines, especially over a short period of time
  • Hmm, that soldering iron tends to get pretty hot. Should be more careful in the future.
  • Bending over for a low viewing angle? The lower back tends to dislike that.
